title: Free Game
description:
Swagu and Perk offer advice to Zion Williamson, compare Ja Morant to a Hall of Famer, try to determine what's wrong with the Kansas City Chiefs, dissect what went on between Dwight Howard and Anthony Davis, and highlight some Louisiana dads for taking action. Plus, a story about teammates going at it in the locker room with boxing gloves on. Let's get it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
